original_text: Now Peter was sitting outside in the courtyard. And a servant girl came up to him and said, “You also were with Jesus the Galilean.”
korean_text: 베드로가 바깥 뜰에 앉았더니 한 여종이 나아와 이르되 너도 갈릴리 사람 예수와 함께 있었도다 하거늘

sentences.original_text: Now Peter was sitting outside in the courtyard.
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 베드로는 밖 뜰에 앉아 있었다.

sentences.original_text: And a servant girl came up to him
“You also were with Jesus the Galilean.”
sentences.korean_translation: 당신도 갈릴리 사람 예수와 함께 있었느니라.
